pages.text: $(bgreen)Winter Melon$() tries to calm his nerves. He hears zombies approach. Will he make it? Will anyone make it?$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)225$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Very Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)range attack$() plant that throws $(bred)one Ice Melon$() that can deal $(bred)splash damage$() and $(baqua)cool down$() to all enemies in 3 blocks every 3 seconds to attack enemy.
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will throw $(bred)powered ice melons$() to $(l)all surrounding enemies$().
